# GKSessionMode.server

**Case**

A server advertises itself to local devices using its [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/sessionID] property.

## Declaration

```swift
case server
```

## Constants

- **GKSessionMode.client**: A client searches for servers advertising the same [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/sessionID] property.
- **GKSessionMode.peer**: A peer advertises like a server and searches like a client.
